TPolicyManager.remove(string,string) Method

Summary

Removes a policy rule from the adapter

Namespace: Casbin.Policy
Syntax
Delphi
private
 procedure remove (const aPolicyDefinition: string; const aFilter: string); overload;

Parameters

aPolicyDefinition
Type: string

The definition of the policy (e.g. p=sub, act)

aFilter
Type: string

It can contain the tag of the rule (e.g. 'p') or a filter.The filter should be assigned to an object as defined in the model (Policy) using the assign operator

Implements

IPolicyManager.remove(string,string)
Examples

  • remove ('p')
  • remove ('sub=john')
  • remove ('domain=network*')

See Also

Reference

  • TPolicyManager
  • Casbin.Policy
